About Me

Here are some interesting things about me!

BIO

I am a software developer seeking employment as a freelance web developer. I am a graduate of the Kentucky Community and Technical College System, where I earned a degree in Computer and Information Technology, with a focus on Software Development. I am currently located in Lexington Kentucky, where I own a home and live with my wife, THREE dogs, and our gorgeous baby girl.

Skills and Expertise

I have experience in various web technologies, which I have acquired both in school, and through online resources I have studied on my own. Some of the skills I possess include: HTML, CSS and Javascript. I have also worked with frameworks such as Bootstrap, Vue and Vuetify. Additionally, I have built mobile applications for the Android platform using Android Studio and Java.

Hobbies

When I'm not working to improve my skills as programmer, I enjoy a number of hobbies. My favorite thing to do outside of coding is playing video games. My favorite game at the moment is a First Person Arena Shooter called Overwatch. I play this and most other games on my desktop computer, which I built custom. I enjoy taking apart computers and putting them back together, or building one from scratch. I also like to get outside and enjoy nice weather when I get the chance. I play a number of sports, especially softball with a group of friends throughout the year on the weekends. I also enjoy camping or hiking with my wife and my dogs!
